about_the_game:
Mortuar is psychological horror game where you and up to three other players are tasked with investigating haunted sites. Upon identifying what type of ghost haunts the area, you must exorcise it in order to finally free the realm of its unearthly presence. Make use of various ghost hunting equipment and closely follow your journal’s instructions in order to perform the ritual.

  • Two locations to choose from
    Both set in an area resembling the infamous Hoia Baciu Forest, there are two distinct locations to choose from. Explore the old, abandoned church set on a hill, where even the priest who used to serve this godly place left in a hurry, or delve deep into the mysterious mansion that has been left abandoned for a long time for unknown reasons.

  • Equip yourself accordingly
    Discover a diverse list of equipment that can aid you in identifying the ghost. You will find all the classics, such as EMF readers, flashlights and holy crosses and also other items which will then aid you in your quest to banish the ghost from the mortal realm.

  • Terrifying encounters
    The ghost is not just an entity that aimlessly roams about, it’s a malevolent spirit who seeks vengeance upon the living. The ghost will start out more passive, manifesting only to drain your sanity at first. However, if you wander time in its territory, it will not hesitate to hunt you down. Watch out, it is always listening to you!

  • Teamwork makes the dream work
    While you can battle the ghost on your own, your experience can be greatly enhanced by bringing in some friends! Cooperate with your team to identify the ghost faster and then to make the banishing process less dangerous.

short_description: Mortuar is a 1-4 player Online co-op psychological horror game. Delve deep into Hoia Baciu Forest where eerie sightings and paranormal activity have transpired. Make use of various ghost hunting equipment to first identify the ghost's type, then attempt to banish it back to the afterlife.
